examples: he was engaged to get married to Ginger

verb.description: Cause to meet or fit together; combine.
examples: the show marries poetry with art
the two halves are trimmed and married up

exclamation.description: Expressing surprise, indignation, or emphatic assertion.

phrases: These findings may help marriage-minded women identify the men who are most likely to be the marrying kind.
She isn't the marrying kind. If you knew her, she'd be nice to you till she got a good chance to flay you alive.
Ashley is the marrying kind, Elaine is not, and she has denied his five proposals.
They just… neither seemed to be the marrying kind.
origin: Late Middle English: variant of Mary.
